title: WTB 19th Century items that grab my attention!
author: anchorednw

posts.post_title: WTB 19th Century items that grab my attention!
posts.post_content:
I absolutely love 19th century baseball (and other or non-sports) items, but that's why we're all here, right?!?

My collection is young; mostly N28 and a cool N398 Yum Yum (pictured below).

What am I looking for? Heck, who knows, but if anyone has any lower grade/authentic condition N-cards (especially N162, N172, N175 and N403) at price points below $500, I am looking to continue to feed my new addiction.
